snippet: Achieving basic rights shouldn’t have to depend, haphazardly, on the kindness of employers.
abstract: Editorial highlights study that confirms that domestic workers are suffering from predictable consequences of toiling behind closed doors in unregulated industry; calls for domestic labor to be included in list of occupations that enjoy core federal and state workplace protections.
lead_paragraph: Achieving basic rights shouldn’t have to depend, haphazardly, on the kindness of employers.

headline.main: A Troubling Portrait of Domestic Work
headline.print_headline: A Troubling Portrait of Domestic Work
